title: WEATHER FORECAST FOR 14 JANUARY 2026 Issued at 2.00 p.m. on 13 January 2026 Showery condition over the island is expected to be reduced from January 15th. A few showers are likely in Uva, Eastern and Central provinces. Showers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in Colombo, Kaluthara, Galle, Matara and Rathnapura districts after 2.00 pm. Mainly fair weather will prevail elsewhere. Misty conditions can be expected at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa and Central provinces and in Galle and Matara districts during the early hours of the morning. The general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
